content.rendered:
SAFETY DEPOSIT BOXES
IN Manhattan

Secure your most valuable possessions at our world-class high-security

storage facility in Manhattan’s CBD. Professional, confidential and most importantly

– completely secure. Open an account to secure your private box today.

Book a Tour

Manhattan's Most Secure Safe Deposit Box

Fortis Vault is Manhattan’s premier destination for secure and reliable safety deposit boxes. We offer a range of solutions to meet your individual needs, all housed within our state-of-the-art, high-security facility in the heart of the CBD.

SECURE YOUR VALUABLES WITH At Integrated Vaults

At Integrated Vaults provides unparalleled safety deposit boxes and bullion storage solutions in the heart of Manhattan’s CBD. We understand the growing concern about property crime, and our secure facilities offer peace of mind, knowing your valuables are protected.

 

At Integrated Vaults, we offer uncompromising security for your valuables. Our state-of-the-art facility boasts the latest security measures, including 24/7 surveillance, bank-grade vault doors, and advanced alarm systems. We also provide a variety of safety deposit box sizes to accommodate your specific needs, from compact boxes for essential documents to larger options for precious metals or heirlooms. Enjoy convenient access to your safety deposit box during our operating hours, unlike traditional bank offerings, prioritising your time for a flexible and stress-free experience. This ensures unparalleled privacy, unwavering security, and unmatched convenience.

SECURE A SAFETY DEPOSIT BOX

OUR PRIORITY

At Integrated Vaults, security is not just a promise; it’s our founding principle. We understand the seriousness of securing your valuables, so we’ve invested in the most advanced security measures.

 

Multi-Layered Security: Our state-of-the-art facility boasts restricted access protocols, including biometric scanners and 24/7 surveillance. All vaults are constructed with reinforced steel and the most robust materials, offering unparalleled property protection.

WHY CHOOSE At Integrated Vaults?

SUPERIOR CUSTOMER SERVICE

 

Our professional staff is dedicated to providing you with exceptional service and support.

NO ACCESS FEES

Pay only for your safety deposit box size.

NO HIDDEN FEES

We offer complete transparency in our pricing.

STATE-OF-THE-ART SECURITY TECHNOLOGY

 

We utilise the latest security advancements to protect your valuables.

FLEXIBLE ACCESS OPTIONS

 

Choose the access plan that best suits your needs through convenient scheduling.

PRIVATE VIEWING ROOMS

 

Discreetly review your belongings in a dedicated, secure space.

SOLUTIONS OFFERED

At Integrated Vaults cater to a wide range of valuables

Jewellery

 

From priceless heirlooms to everyday precious pieces, jewellery holds immense sentimental and financial value. At Integrated Vaults provides a secure environment to protect your jewellery from theft, loss, or damage.

Gold bullions

 

Bullion, including gold and silver bars and coins, represents a significant investment. At Integrated Vaults offers a safe and secure haven for your bullion holdings. Our high-security vaults are built to withstand break-in attempts, providing peace of mind.

Important Documents

 

Irreplaceable documents like wills, passports, birth certificates, and property deeds hold immense importance. At Integrated Vaults provides a safe and reliable solution for storing these critical documents.

Currency

 

Cash or foreign currency can be a security risk when kept at home or in a traditional safe. At Integrated Vaults offers a secure and discreet solution for storing your currency. Our access-controlled vaults ensure that only authorised individuals can access your valuables.

SAFETY DEPOSIT BOX MADE EASY

Booking your safety deposit box At Integrated Vaults is a simple process

01. Find At Integrated Vaults

Our location is deliberately chosen to be easily accessible.

Find now

0.2 Select a storage size

A wide range is available, so you can choose the one that suits your needs. Browse our selection of safety deposit box sizes online or visit us in person to discuss the requirements with a member of our friendly team.

View Storage Sizes

03. Book an appointment

Book your preferred appointment online to save time.

Start Now

CONTACT US TODAY!

Have questions or want to arrange a tour of our secure facility? Fill out the quick and easy form here, and a member of our team will be happy to assist you.

Phone:

(646) 338 4170
(9am – 5pm AEST)

 

Fax:

(03) 9654 8167

 

Mailing Address:

800 Third Avenue
Midtown Manhattan, New York 10022

 

Email Us:

info@integratedvaults.com

 

OUR VAULT LOCATION

Level 10, 227 Collins Street (Wales Corner Building)
Manhattan, Victoria
United States
